content: *** errata instead of this decrease in every second row with the following method ssk before stm knit 1 k2tog after stm when you have decreased to 14 sts knit one more row then k2tog the complete next row - 7 sts on the needle do this you have to decrease to 12 sts and then knit a whole row and k2tog the next row so at the end you ll have 6 sts *** **the little fisherman s beanie is a classic fisherman hat with a twist it is worked bottom up in 1x1 rib after a small hem after it is finished it can be worn with the hem folded up or left the hem downwards as a slouchy hat ** materials - 50g drops flora 13 - jeansblue - 25g drops brushed alpaca silk 25 - steel blue 2 thread of flora and 1 thread of brushed alpaca silk held together - 5 5mm circular knitting needles 40cm - 6mm circular knitting needles 40cm - stitch markers - tapestry needle gauge 12 sts and 22 row = 10cm in 1x1 rib stitch 6mm needles
